WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to the ANY.RUN Sandbox API for Telegram! Please use the menu below or type a command.
HELP_MESSAGE:
Here are the main options:

• Profile: View and manage your profile
• Settings: Adjust bot settings
• Help: Show this help message
• Language: Change the bot language
• Admin: Access admin functions (if you're an admin)

You can also use these commands:
/start - Show the main menu
/menu - Show the main menu
/help - Show this help message
/language - Update the bot's language
LANGUAGE_UPDATE_ERROR: An error occurred while updating the language. Please try again later.
MAIN_MENU_TEXT: Main Menu - Please select an option:
ADMIN_MENU_TEXT: Admin Menu - Please select an option:
BOT_IN_ALL_GROUPS: The bot is a member of all required groups.
BOT_MISSING_GROUPS: The bot is missing from the following groups: {groups}
SELECT_USERS_TO_MANAGE: Enter the Telegram IDs of the users you want to manage, separated by commas:
INVALID_USER_IDS: The following user IDs are invalid: {users}. Please try again.
CHOOSE_ACTION: Choose an action for the selected users:
USERS_BANNED: The selected users have been banned.
USERS_UNBANNED: The selected users have been unbanned.
NO_ACTION_TAKEN: No action was taken. Returning to the admin menu.
BACKUP_CREATED: Database backup created successfully. The file is attached.
BACKUP_ERROR: An error occurred while creating the database backup. Please try again later.
PROFILE_INFO: Here you can view and manage your profile information.
SETTINGS_INFO: Here you can adjust various bot settings.
UNKNOWN_OPTION: Sorry, I don't recognize that option. Please try again.
LANGUAGE_MENU_INFO: Here you can change the bot's language.
ERROR_OCCURRED: An error occurred. Please try again later.
